articles.author: Sam Meredith
articles.title: Ukraine just stopped Russian gas flows to Europe. Here's who's most at risk - CNBC
articles.description: Austria has insisted it is well prepared for the stoppage, but Slovakia has threatened to cut electricity supplies to neighboring Ukraine.
articles.content:
The Mitte Combined Heat and Power (CHP) natural gas power plant, operated by Vattenfall AB, in Berlin, Germany, on Wednesday, Jan. 1, 2025.
Ukraine halted the flow of Russian gas to several European… [+5866 chars]
